name: Mighty Rock
description:
Hi, here is my entry for my first game jam:  GamesPlusJam3 ! It has been made in less than 48 hours with Unity !

My theme was: "Make a Tactical Sword Game" 

Updates my come later !
Feel free to tell me about bugs you encounter while playing in the comments !

Credits and controls are available in game but I'll post them here too:

Controls: A (move left), D (move right), E (enter combat near an enemy),  (T for tutorial);

Art: Everything was taken on the unity assets store:
    -"Bandits - Pixel art" from Sven Thole.
    -"Tiny RPG - Forest"and "Sunny Land Forest" from Ansimuz
    -"Fantasy Wooden GUI: Free" from Black Hammer 

Music: Music made by @chris.gruchacz (Instagram): https://soundcloud.com/chris_gruchacz.  Sounds effect from sfxr and this pack: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
